Translations.Text: Yara amara saksat asa kare na, tara bale, amadera kache pheresata abatirna kara hala na kena? Athaba amara amadera palanakartake dekhi na kena? Tara nijedera antare ahankara posana kare ebam gurutara abadhyataya mete utheche.
Yedina tara pheresataderake dekhabe, sedina aparadhidera jan'ye kona susambada thakabe na ebam tara balabe, kona badha yadi ta atake rakhata.
Ami tadera krtakarmera prati manonibesa karaba, atahpara seguloke biksipta dhulikanarupe kare deba.
Sedina jannatidera basasthana habe uttama ebam bisramasthala habe manorama.
Sedina akasa meghamalasaha bidirna habe ebam sedina pheresatadera namiye deya habe
sedina satyikara rajatba habe dayamaya allahara ebam kapheradera pakse dinati habe kathina.
Jalema sedina apana hastadbaya dansana karate karate balabe, haya aphasosa! Ami yadi rasulera sathe patha abalambana karatama.
Haya amara durbhagya, ami yadi amukake bandhurupe grahana na karatama.
Amara kache upadesa asara para se amake ta theke bibhranta karechila. Sayatana manusake bipadakale dhomka deya.
Rasula balalenah he amara palanakarta, amara sampradaya e'i kora'anake pralapa sabyasta kareche.
Emanibhabe pratyeka nabira jan'ye ami aparadhidera madhya theke satru karechi. Apanara jan'ye apanara palanakarta pathapradarsaka o sahayyakarirupe yathesta.

Satya pratyakhanakarira bale, tamra prati samagra kora'ana ekadaphaya abatirna hala na kena? Ami emanibhabe abatirna karechi ebam krame krame abrtti karechi apanara antakaranake majabuta karara jan'ye.
Tara apanara kache kona samasya upasthapita karale'i ami apanake tara sathika ja'oyaba o sundara byakhya dana kari.
Yaderake mukha thubare pare thaka abasthaya jahannamera dike ekatrita kara habe, tadera'i sthana habe nikrsta ebam tara'i pathabhrasta.
Ami to musake kitaba diyechi ebam tamra sathe tamra bhrata harunake sahayyakari karechi.
Atahpara ami balechi, tomara se'i sampradayera kache ya'o, yara amara ayatasamuhake mithya abhihita kareche. Atahpara ami taderake samule dhbansa kare diyechi.

Nuhera sampradaya yakhana rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karala, takhana ami taderake nimajjata karalama ebam taderake manabamandalira jan'ye nidarsana kare dilama. Jalemadera jan'ye ami yantranadayaka sasti prastuta kare rekhechi.
Ami dhbansa karechi ada, samuda, kapabasi ebam tadera madhyabarti aneka sampradayake.
Ami pratyekera jan'ye'i drstanta barnana karechi ebam pratyekake'i sampurnarupe dhbansa karechi.
Tara to se'i janapadera upara diye'i yatayata kare, yara opara barsita hayeche manda brsti. Tabe ki tara ta pratyaksa kare na? Baram tara punarujjibanera asanka kare na.
Tara yakhana apanake dekhe, takhana apanake kebala bidrupera patrarupe grahana kare, bale, e-i ki se yake allaha ‘rasula’ kare prerana karechena
se to amaderake amadera upasyaganera kacha theke sariye'i dita, yadi amara taderake amkare dhare na thakatama. Tara yakhana sasti pratyaksa karabe, takhana janate parabe ke adhika pathabhrasta.
Apani ki take dekhena na, ye tara prabrttike upasyarupe grahana kare? Tabu'o ki apani tara yim'madara habena
apani ki mane karena ye, tadera adhikansa sone athaba bojhe? Tara to catuspada jantura mata; baram ara'o pathabhranta
Tumi ki tomara palanakartake dekha na, tini kibhabe chayake bilambita karena? Tini iccha karale eke sthira rakhate paratena. Erapara ami suryake karechi era nirdesaka.
Atahpara ami eke nijera dike dhire dhire gutiye ani.
Tini'i to tomadera jan'ye ratrike karechena abarana, nidrake bisrama ebam dinake karechena ba'ire gamanera jan'ye.
Tini'i sbiya rahamatera prakkale batasake susambadabahirupe prerana karena. Ebam ami akasa theke pabitrata arjanera jan'ye pani barsana kari.
Taddbara mrta bhubhagake sanjibita karara jan'ye ebam amara srsta jibajantu o aneka manusera trsna nibaranera jan'ye.
Ebam ami ta tadera madhye bibhinnabhabe bitarana kari, yate tara smarana kare. Kintu adhikansa loka akrtajnata chara kichu'i kare na.
Ami iccha karale pratyeka janapade ekajana bhaya pradarsanakari prerana karate paratama.
Ata'eba apani kapheradera anugatya karabena na ebam tadera sathe era sahayye kathora sangrama karuna.
Tini'i samantarale du'i samudra prabahita karechena, eti mista, trsna nibaraka o eti lona, bisbada; ubhayera majhakhane rekhechena ekati antaraya, ekati durbhedya arala.
Tini'i pani theke srsti karechena manabake, atahpara take raktagata, bansa o baibahika samparkasila karechena. Tomara palanakarta sabakichu karate saksama.
Tara ebadata kare allahara paribarte emana kichura, ya tadera upakara karate pare na ebam ksati'o karate pare na. Kaphera to tara palanakartara prati prsthapradarsanakari.
Ami apanake susambada o satarkakarirupe'i prerana karechi.
Baluna, ami tomadera kache era kona binimaya ca'i na, kintu ye iccha kare, se tara palanakartara patha abalambana karuka.
Apani se'i ciranjibera upara bharasa karuna, yara mrtyu ne'i ebam tamra prasansasaha pabitrata ghosana karuna. Tini bandara gonaha samparke yathesta khabaradara.
Tini nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera antarbarti sabakichu chayadine srsti karechena, atahpara arase samasina hayechena. Tini parama dayamaya. Tamra samparke yini abagata, take jijnesa kara.
Taderake yakhana bala haya, dayamayake sejada kara, takhana tara bale, dayamaya abara ke? Tumi ka'uke sejada karara adesa karale'i ki amara sejada karaba? Ete tadera palayanaparata'i brd'dhi paya.
Kalyanamaya tini, yini nabhomandale rasicakra srsti karechena ebam tate rekhechena surya o diptimaya candra.
Yara anusandhanapriya athaba yara krtajnatapriya tadera jan'ye tini ratri o dibasa srsti karechena paribartanasilarupe.
Rahamana-era banda tara'i, yara prthibite namrabhabe calaphera kare ebam tadera sathe yakhana murkhara katha balate thake, takhana tara bale, salama.
Ebam yara ratri yapana kare palanakartara uddesye sejadabanata haye o dandayamana haye
ebam yara bale, he amara palanakarta, amadera kachatheke jahannamera sasti hatiye da'o. Niscaya era sasti niscita binasa
basabasa o abasthanasthala hisebe ta kata nikrsta jayaga.
Ebam tara yakhana byaya kare, takhana ayatha byaya kare na krpanata'o kare na ebam tadera pantha haya etadubhayera madhyabarti.

Ebam yara allahara sathe an'ya upasyera ebadata kare na, allaha yara hatya abaidha karechena, sangata karana byatita take hatya kare na ebam byabhicara kare na. Yara ekaja kare, tara sastira sam'mukhina habe.
Keyamatera dina tadera sasti dbiguna habe ebam tathaya lanchita abasthaya cirakala basabasa karabe.
Kintu yara ta'oba kare bisbasa sthapana kare ebam satkarma kare, allaha tadera gonahake pun'ya dbara paribartata kare ebam debena. Allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu.
Ye ta'oba kare o satkarma kare, se phire asara sthana allahara dike phire ase.
Ebam yara mithya kaje yogadana kare na ebam yakhana asara kriyakarmera sam'mukhina haya, takhana mana raksarthe bhadrabhabe cale yaya.
Ebam yaderake tadera palanakartara ayatasamuha bojhano hale tate andha o badhira sadrsa acarana kare na.
Ebam yara bale, he amadera palanakarta, amadera stridera paksa theke ebam amadera santanera paksa theke amadera jan'ye cokhera sitalata dana kara ebam amaderake muttakidera jan'ye adarsasbarupa kara.
Taderake tadera sabarera pratidane jannate kaksa deya habe ebam taderake tathaya doya o salama sahakare abhyarthana kara habe.
Tathaya tara cirakala basabasa karabe. Abasthanasthala o basasthana hisebe ta kata uttama.
Baluna, amara palanakarta para'oya karena na yadi tomara tamke na daka. Tomara mithya balecha. Ata'eba satbara neme asabe anibarya sasti.
Tba, sina, mima.
Egulo suspasta kitabera ayata.
Tara bisbasa kare na bale apani hayato marmabyathaya atnaghati habena.
Ami yadi iccha kari, tabe akasa theke tadera kache kona nidarsana nayila karate pari. Atahpara tara era samane nata haye yabe.
Yakhana'i tadera kache rahamana era kona natuna upadesa ase, takhana'i tara ta theke mukha phiriye neya.
Ata'eba tara to mithyaropa kareche'i; sutaram ye bisaya niye tara thatta-bidrupa karata, tara yathartha sbarupa sighra'i tadera kache pauchabe.
Tara ki bhuprsthera prati drstipata kare na? Ami tate sarbaprakara bisesa-bastu kata udagata karechi.
Niscaya ete nidarsana ache, kintu tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya.
Apanara palanakarta to parakramasali parama dayalu.

phera'unera sampradayera nikata; tara ki bhaya kare na
se balala, he amara palanakarta, amara asanka hacche ye, tara amake mithyabadi bale debe.
Ebam amara mana hatabala haye pare ebam amara jihaba acala haye yaya. Sutaram harunera kache barta prerana karuna.
Amara birud'dhe tadera abhiyoga ache. Ata'eba ami asanka kari ye, tara amake hatya karabe.
Allaha balena, kakhana'i naya tomara ubhaye ya'o amara nidarsanabali niye. Ami tomadera sathe theke sonaba.
Ata'eba tomara phera'a'unera kache ya'o ebam bala, amara bisbajagatera palanakartara rasula.
Yate tumi bani-isara'ilake amadera sathe yete da'o.
Phera'una balala, amara ki tomake sisu abasthaya amadera madhye lalana-palana karini? Ebam tumi amadera madhye jibanera bahu bachara katiyecha.
Tumi se'i-tomara aparadha ya karabara karecha. Tumi hale krtaghna.
Musa balala, ami se aparadha takhana karechi, yakhana ami bhranta chilama.
Atahpara ami bhita haye tomadera kacha theke palayana karalama. Erapara amara palanakarta amake prajna dana karechena ebam amake payagambara karechena.
Amara prati tomara ye anugrahera katha balacha, ta e'i ye, tumi bani-isala'ilake golama baniye rekhecha.
Phera'una balala, bisbajagatera palanakarta abara ki
musa balala, tini nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhyabarti sabakichura palanakarta yadi tomara bisbasi ha'o.
Phera'una tara parisadabargake balala, tomara ki sunacha na
musa balala, tini tomadera palanakarta ebam tomadera purbabartidera'o palanakarta.
Phera'una balala, tomadera prati prerita tomadera rasulati niscaya'i bad'dha pagala.
Musa balala, tini purba, pascima o etadubhayera madhyabarti saba kichura palanakarta, yadi tomara bojha.
Phera'una balala, tumi yadi amara paribarte an'yake upasyarupe grahana kara tabe ami abasya'i tomake karagare niksepa karaba.

phera'una balala, tumi satyabadi hale ta upasthita kara.
Atahpara tini lathi niksepa karale muhurtera madhye ta suspasta ajagara haye gela.
Ara tini tara hata bera karalena, tatksanat ta darsakadera kache susubhra pratibhata halo.
Phera'una tara parisadabargake balala, niscaya e ekajana sudaksa jadukara.
Se tara jadu bale tomaderake tomadera desa theke bahiskara karate caya. Ata'eba tomadera mata ki
tara balala, take o tara bha'ike kichu abakasa dina ebam sahare sahare ghosaka prerana karuna.
Tara yena apanara kache pratyekati daksa jadukara ke upasthita kare.
Atahpara eka nirdista dine jadukaraderake ekatrita kara hala.

phera'una balala, hamya ebam takhana tomara amara naikatyasiladera antarbhukta habe.
Musa (ah) taderake balalena, niksepa kara tomara ya niksepa karabe.
Atahpara tara tadera rasi o lathi niksepa karala ebam balala, phera'unera iyayatera kasama, amara'i bijayi haba.
Atahpara musa tamra lathi niksepa karala, hathat ta tadera alika kirtiguloke grasa karate lagala.
Takhana jadukarara sejadaya nata haye gela.
Tara balala, amara rabbula alaminera prati bisbasa sthapana karalama.
Yini musa o harunera raba.

Phera'una balala, amara anumati danera purbe'i tomara ki take mene nile? Niscaya se tomadera pradhana, ye tomaderake jadu siksa diyeche. Sighra'i tomara parinama janate parabe. Ami abasya'i tomadera hata o pa biparita dika theke kartana karaba. Ebam tomadera saba'ike sule caraba.

Ami musake adesa karalama ye, amara bandaderake niye ratriyoge bera haye ya'o, niscaya tomadera pascad'dhabana kara habe.

Ami era jan'ye tomadera kache kona pratidana ca'i na. Amara pratidana to bisba-palanakarta debena.
Sara jahanera manusera madhye tomara'i ki purusadera sathe kukarma kara
ebam tomadera palanakarta tomadera jan'ye ye striganake srsti karechena, taderake barjana kara? Baram tomara simalanghanakari sampradaya.
Tara balala, he luta, tumi yadi birata na ha'o, tabe abasya'i tomake bahiskrta kara habe.
Luta balalena, ami tomadera e'i kajake ghrna kari.
He amara palanakarta, amake ebam amara paribarabargake tara ya kare, ta theke raksa kara.
Atahpara ami tamke o tamra paribarabargake raksa karalama.
Eka brd'dha byatita, se chila dhbansa praptadera antarbhukta.
Erapara an'yaderake nipata karalama.
Tadera upara eka bisesa brsti barsana karalama. Bhiti-pradarsita dera jan'ye e'i brsti chila kata nikrsta.
Niscaya'i ete nidarsana rayeche; kintu tadera adhikansa'i bisbasi naya.
Niscaya'i apanara palanakarta prabala parakramasali, parama dayalu.
Banera adhibasira payagambaraganake mithyabadi baleche.
Yakhana so’ayaba tadera ke balalena, tomara ki bhaya kara na
ami tomadera bisbasta payagambara.
Ata'eba, tomara allahake bhaya kara ebam amara anugatya kara.
Ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kona pratidana ca'i na. Amara pratidana to bisba-palanakarta'i debena.
Mapa purna kara ebam yara parimape kama deya, tadera antarbhukta hayo na.
Soja damri-pallaya ojana kara.
Manusake tadera bastu kama di'o na ebam prthibite anartha srsti kare phiro na.
Bhaya kara tamke, yini tomaderake ebam tomadera purbabarti loka-sampradayake srsti karechena.
Tara balala, tumi to jadugrastadera an'yatama.
Tumi amadera mata manusa bai to na'o. Amadera dharana-tumi mithyabadidera antarbhukta.
Ata'eba, yadi satyabadi ha'o, tabe akasera kona tukaro amadera upara phele da'o.
So’ayaba balalena, tomara ya kara, se samparke amara palanakarta bhalarupe abahita.
Atahpara tara tamke mithyabadi bale dila. Phale taderake meghacchanna dibasera ayaba pakara'o karala. Niscaya seta chila eka mahadibasera ayaba.
Niscaya ete nidarsana rayeche; kintu tadera adhikansa'i bisbasa kare na.
Niscaya apanara palanakarta prabala parakramasali, parama dayalu.
E'i kora'ana to bisba-jahanera palanakartara nikata theke abatirna.
Bisbasta pheresata eke niye abatarana kareche.
Apanara antare, yate apani bhiti pradarsanakaridera antarbhukta hana
suspasta arabi bhasaya.
Niscaya era ullekha ache purbabarti kitabasamuhe.
Tadera jan'ye eta ki nidarsana naya ye, bani-isara'ilera alemagana eta abagata ache
yadi ami eke kona bhinnabhasira prati abatirna karatama
atahpara tini ta tadera kache patha karatena, tabe tara tate bisbasa sthapana karata na.
Emanibhabe ami gonahagaradera antare abisbasa sancara karechi.
Tara era prati bisbasa sthapana karabe na, ye paryanta pratyaksa na kare marmantuda ayaba.
Atahpara ta akasmikabhabe tadera kache ese parabe, tara ta bujhate o parabe na.
Takhana tara balabe, amara ki abakasa paba na
Tara ki amara sasti druta kamana kare
apani bhebe dekhuna to, yadi ami taderake bacharera para bachara bhoga-bilasa karate de'i
atahpara ye bisaye taderake oyada deya hata, ta tadera kache ese pare.
Takhana tadera bhoga bilasa ta tadera ki kona upakare asabe
ami kona janapada dhbansa karini; kintu ematabasthaya ye, tara satarkakari chila.
Smarana karanora jan'ye, ebam amara kaja an'yayacarana naya.
E'i kora'ana sayatanara abatirna kareni.
Tara e kajera upayukta naya ebam tara era samartha?451; Rakhe na.
Taderake to srabanera jayaga theke dure rakha rayeche.
Ata'eba, apani allahara sathe an'ya upasyake ahabana karabena na. Karale sastite patita habena.
Apani nikatatama atmiyaderake satarka kare dina.
Ebam apanara anusari muminadera prati sadaya hona.
Yadi tara apanara abadhya kare, tabe bale dina, tomara ya kara, ta theke ami mukta.
Apani bharasa karuna parakramasali, parama dayalura upara
yini apanake dekhena yakhana apani namaye dandayamana hana
ebam namayidera sathe uthabasa karena.
Niscaya tini sarbasrota, sarbajnani.
Ami apanake balaba ki kara nikata sayatanara abatarana kare
tara abatirna haya pratyeka mithyabadi, gonahagarera upara.
Tara sruta katha ene deya ebam tadera adhikansa'i mithyabadi.
Bibhranta lokera'i kabidera anusarana kare.
Tumi ki dekha na ye, tara prati mayadane'i udabhranta haye phire
ebam emana katha bale, ya tara kare na.

Tabe tadera katha bhinna, yara bisbasa sthapana kare o satkarma kare ebam allaha ke khuba smarana kare ebam nipirita ha'oyara para pratisodha grahana kare. Nipiranakarira sighra'i janate parabe tadera gantabyasthala kirupa.
Tba-sina; egulo ala-kora'anera ayata ebam ayata suspasta kitabera.
Muminadera jan'ye patha nirdesa o susambada.
Yara namaya kayema kare, yakata pradana kare ebam parakale niscita bisbasa kare.
Yara parakale bisbasa kare na, ami tadera drstite tadera karmakandake susobhita kare diyechi. Ata'eba, tara udabhranta haye ghure beraya.
Tadera jan'ye'i rayeche manda sasti ebam tara'i parakale adhika ksatigrasta.
Ebam apanake kora'ana pradatta hacche prajnamaya, jnanamaya allahara kacha theke.

Yakhana musa tamra paribarabargake balalenah ami agni dekhechi, ekhana ami sekhana theke tomadera jan'ye kona khabara anate paraba athaba tomadera jan'ye jbalanta angara niye asate paraba yate tomara aguna pohate para.
Atahpara yakhana tini agunera kache asalena takhana a'oyaja hala dhan'ya tini, yini agunera sthane achena ebam yara agunera asepase achena. Bisba jahanera palanakarta allaha pabitra o mahimanbita.
He musa, ami allaha, prabala parakramasali, prajnamaya.

Apani niksepa karuna apanara lathi. Atahpara yakhana tini take sarpera n'yaya chutachuti karate dekhalena, takhana tini biparita dike chutate lagalena ebam pechana phire'o dekhalena na. He musa, bhaya karabena na. Ami ye rayechi, amara kache payagambaragana bhaya karena na.
Tabe ye barabari kare erapara manda karmera paribarte satkarma kare. Niscaya ami ksamasila, parama dayalu.

Apanara hata apanara bagale dhukiye dina, susubhra haye bera habe nirdosa abasthaya. Egulo phera'una o tara sampradayera kache anita nayati nidarsanera an'yatama. Niscaya tara chila papacari sampradaya.
Atahpara yakhana tadera kache amara ujjala nidarsanabali agamana karala, takhana tara balala, eta to suspasta jadu.
Tara an'yaya o ahankara kare nidarsanabalike pratyakhyana karala, yadi'o tadera antara egulo satya bale bisbasa karechila. Ata'eba dekhuna, anarthakaridera parinama kemana hayechila
Ami abasya'i da'uda o sulayamanake jnana dana karechilama. Tamra bale chilena, allahara prasansa, yini amaderake tamra aneka mumina bandara upara sresthatba dana karechena.
Sulayamana da'udera uttaradhikari hayechilena. Balechilena, ‘he loka sakala, amake uranta paksikulera bhasa siksa deya hayeche ebam amake saba kichu deya hayeche. Niscaya eta suspasta sresthatba. ’
Sulayamanera samane tara senabahinike samabeta kara hala. Jbina-manusa o paksikulake, atahpara taderake bibhinna byuhe bibhakta kara hala.

Yakhana tara pipilika adhyusita upatyakaya paumchala, takhana eka pipilika balala, he pipilikara dala, tomara tomadera grhe prabesa kara. An'yathaya sulayamana o tara bahini ajnatasare tomaderake pista kare phelabe.

Tara katha sune sulayamana mucaki hasalena ebam balalena, he amara palanakarta, tumi amake samartha?2470;A'o yate ami tomara se'i niyamatera krtajnata prakasa karate pari, ya tumi amake o amara pita-matake dana karecha ebam yate ami tomara pachandaniya satkarma karate pari ebam amake nija anugrahe tomara satkarmaparayana bandadera antarbhukta kara.
Sulayamana paksidera khomja khabara nilena, atahpara balalena, ki hala, hudahudake dekhachi na kena? Naki se anupasthita
ami abasya'i take kathora sasti deba kimba hatya karaba athaba se upasthita karabe upayukta karana.
Kichuksana pare'i huda ese balala, apani ya abagata nana, ami ta abagata hayechi. Ami apanara kache saba theke niscita sambada niye agamana karechi.
Ami eka narike sababasidera upara rajatba karate dekhechi. Take sabakichu'i deya hayeche ebam tara ekata birata sinhasana ache.

Ami take o tara sampradayake dekhalama tara allahara paribarte suryake sejada karache. Sayatana tadera drstite tadera karyabali susobhita kare diyeche. Atahpara taderake satpatha theke nibrtta kareche. Ata'eba tara satpatha paya na.
Tara allahake sejada kare na kena, yini nabhomandala o bhumandalera gopana bastu prakasa karena ebam janena ya tomara gopana kara o ya prakasa kara.
Allaha byatita kona upasya ne'i; tini maha arasera malika.
Sulayamana balalena, ekhana ami dekhaba tumi satya balacha, na tumi mithyabadi.
Tumi amara e'i patra niye ya'o ebam eta tadera kache arpana kara. Atahpara tadera kacha theke sare para ebam dekha, tara ki ja'oyaba deya.
Bilakisa balala, he parisadabarga, amake ekati sam'manita patra deya hayeche.
Se'i patra sulayamanera paksa theke ebam ta e'ih sasima data, parama dayalu, allahara name suru
amara mokabelaya sakti pradarsana karo na ebam basyata sbikara kare amara kache upasthita ha'o.
Bilakisa balala, he parisadabarga, amake amara kaje paramarsa da'o. Tomadera upasthiti byatireke ami kona kaje sid'dhanta grahana kari na.
Tara balala, amara saktisali ebam kathora yod'dha. Ekhana sid'dhanta grahanera ksamata apanara'i. Ata'eba apani bhebe dekhuna, amaderake ki adesa karabena.
Se balala, raja badasara yakhana kona janapade prabesa kare, takhana take biparyasta kare deya ebam sekhanakara sambhranta byaktibargake apadastha kare. Tara'o erupa'i karabe.
Ami tamra kache kichu upadhaukana pathacchi; dekhi prerita lokera ki ja'oyaba ane.

Atahpara yakhana duta sulayamanera kache agamana karala, takhana sulayamana balalena, tomara ki dhanasampada dbara amake sahayya karate ca'o? Allaha amake ya diyechena, ta tomaderake pradatta bastu theke uttama. Baram tomara'i tomadera upadhaukana niye sukhe thaka.

Phire ya'o tadera kache. Ekhana abasya'i ami tadera birud'dhe eka sain'yabahini niye asaba, yara mokabela karara sakti tadera ne'i. Ami abasya'i taderake apadastha kare sekhana theke bahiskrta karaba ebam tara habe lanchita.
Sulayamana balalena, he parisadabarga, tara atnasamarpana kare amara kache asara purbe ke bilakisera sinhasana amake ene debe
janaika daitya-jina balala, apani apanara sthana theke uthara purbe ami ta ene deba ebam ami ekaje saktibana, bisbasta.

Kitabera jnana yara chila, se balala, apanara dike apanara cokhera palaka phelara purbe'i ami ta apanake ene deba. Atahpara sulayamana yakhana ta samane raksita dekhalena, takhana balalena eta amara palanakartara anugraha, yate tini amake pariksa karena ye, ami krtajnata prakasa kari, na akrtajnata prakasa kari. Ye krtajnata prakasa kare, se nijera upakarera jan'ye'i krtajnata prakasa kare ebam ye akrtajnata prakasa kare se januka ye, amara palanakarta abhabamukta krpasila.
Sulayamana balalena, bilakisera samane tara sinhasanera akara-akrti badaliye da'o, dekhaba se sathika bujhate pare, na se tadera antarbhukta, yadera disa ne'i

atahpara yakhana bilakisa ese gela, takhana take jijnasa kara hala, tomara sinhasana ki erupa'i? Se balala, mane haya eta seta'i. Amara purbe'i samasta abagata hayechi ebam amara ajnabaha'o haye gechi.
Allahara paribarte se yara ebadata karata, se'i take imana theke nibrtta karechila. Niscaya se kaphera sampradayera antarbhukta chila.

Take bala hala, e'i prasade prabesa kara. Yakhana se tara prati drstipata karala se dharana karala ye, eta sbaccha gabhira jalasaya. Se tara payera gocha khule phelala. Sulayamana balala, eta to sbaccha sphatika nirmita prasada. Bilakisa balala, he amara palanakarta, ami to nijera prati juluma karechi. Ami sulayamanera sathe bisba jahanera palanakarta allahara kache atnasamarpana karalama.
Ami samuda sampradayera kache tadera bha'i salehake e'i marme prerana karechi ye, tomara allahara ebadata kara. Atahpara tara dbidhabibhakta haye bitarke prabrtta hala.
Saleha balalena, he amara sampradaya, tomara kalyanera purbe druta akalyana kamana karacha kena? Tomara allahara kache ksama prarthana karacha na kena? Sambhabatah tomara dayaprapta habe.

Tara balala, tomake ebam tomara sathe yara ache, taderake amara akalyanera pratika mane kari. Saleha balalena, tomadera mangalamangala allahara kache; baram tomara emana sampradaya, yaderake pariksa kara hacche.
Ara se'i sahare chila emana ekajana byakti, yara desamaya anartha srsti kare berata ebam sansodhana karata na.

Tara balala, tomara paraspare allahara name sapatha grahana kara ye, amara ratrikale take o tara paribarabargake hatya karaba. Atahpara tara dabidarake bale deba ye, tara paribarabargera hatyakanda amara pratyaksa karini. Amara niscaya'i satyabadi.
Tara eka cakranta karechila ebam ami'o eka cakranta karechilama. Kintu tara bujhate pareni.
Ata'eba, dekha tadera cakrantera parinama, ami abasra'i taderake ebam tadera sampradayake nastanabuda kare diyechi.
E'i to tadera barighara-tadera abisbasera karane janasun'ya abasthaya pare ache. Niscaya ete jnani sampradayera jan'ye nidarsana ache.
Yara bisbasa sthapana karechila ebam paraheyagara chila, taderake ami ud'dhara karechi.
Smarana kara lutera katha, tini tamra ka'omake balechilena, tomara kena aslila kaja karacha? Athaca era parinatira katha tomara abagata acha
tomara ki kamatrptira jan'ya nariderake chere puruse upagata habe? Tomara to eka barbara sampradaya.
